text:
@marklevinshow 1) HCQ has been used for Lupus and many autoimmune conditions for years, so how is this COVID-19 related. 
2) thats not HCQ, thats atovaquone/proguanil. 
3) What does a prescription from 2008 even show us? 
4) Why do you care?
